description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of Medina County and Ohio ... [By W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle and W. A. Goodspeed.] Illustrated" Author: PERRIN, William Henry. Page: 8 Place of Publishing: Chicago Date of Publishing: 1881 Publisher: Baskin & Battey Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002876055 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
